name: Tazaldoo
tag_list: journalism, social-media, twitter, search-engine, curation, verification
overview: Tazaldoo UG is a Berlin based IT-startup founded by Frederik Fischer, Torsten Müller and Arno Dirlam in 2012. The company has set itself the goal of turning the flood of information from social media into a reliable and efficient source. Therefore tazaldoo develops software solutions that enable information workers to find and analyse relevant content and sources in social media. Tazaldoos first product ‘tame’, a browser-based web application, is a personalized search engine for the microblogging service Twitter, that delivers users a quick overview about their timeline activity and suggests hashtags, experts and content for any search term. Tazaldoo is supported with EXIST, an entrepreneurial grant by Germany’s Federal Ministry of Economics and Technology and the European Social Fund (ESF).

external_links.title: FÜR RECHERCHE UND EINORDNUNG: Tame bringt Kontext zu Twitter
